group_1.narration: The guy who started this was still making@trouble, and I traced him to Daito Ward.
But I ran into someone named Kanagi Izumi,@a Magical Girl who thought I was trying to@invade her territory.
I wanted to set the story straight. But more @than that, I wanted to track that guy down.
So I didn't put much effort into fighting@and just dodged the whole time...

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Mmgh...
You hit pretty hard.
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:1016A01]I suppose I will have to as well!

group_1.textRight: C'mon, give me a break! This's all just@a big misunderstanding.

group_1.textLeft: How do you plan to prove that?
Let's look at the facts. You're trespassing@past the border.

group_1.textRight: I didn't know about any border! I didn't@mean to trespass.

group_1.textLeft: A likely story...
Who's there?
My name is Yachiyo Nanami.
Well yes.
I mean, we're getting involved in your@situation. That much should be obvious.
This is the first time we've seen either of@you around here.

group_1.textRight: (Damn... I definitely chased her too far@out of bounds.)

group_1.textLeft: Care to explain what you were up to?

group_1.textRight: This girl here invaded my territory, so@of course, I had toâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Your territory? You mean this area right@here?
So wouldn't that mean you ended up doing@exactly what you accuse her of doing?
So what's your side of the story?

group_1.narration: I told my side of things to the two Magical@Girls who appeared out of thin air.@I made sure Kanagi heard it too...

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Don't you think you were a bit harsh? You@railed on her without hearing her out.
Many Magical Girls I don't recognize have@entered my area looking for Witches lately.
It's been a giant hassle. That's why I@pursued her.

group_1.textLeft: Seems like you go to great lengths to chase@these girls away.

group_1.textRight: I suppose I may have lost my temper.

group_1.textLeft: Kanae was it?
You weren't trying to make trouble, right?

group_1.textRight: Of course not! I was there for a completely@different reason.

group_1.textLeft: Then should we call the matter settled?

group_1.textRight: Or...you could possibly be colluding with@her.

group_1.textLeft: Well, by your own logic, we're presently@standing in OUR territory.
You did the same wrong by invading here.@Shall we call it even?
Wonderful.
Are you okay with that, Kanae?

group_1.textRight: You know, all I wanted was...!

group_1.textLeft: She fainted!
Hey! Wake up!
